name: 80´s Madness Adventure
description:
Always wanted to fight 80´s bad guys in the (not so far) post-apocalypse?

Good news for you then, because you will do it... wielding a SWORD! But hold on, if they come from the 80´s... why do they have laser guns?!

Introducing my first developed and designed game, I hope you enjoy this 2D classic arcade lookalike game. And, no spoilers, but a secret awaits if you are perceptive enough...

Thanks for playing!!
